com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.mac

Class MacLayerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.DefaultLayerFactory
      • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.mac.MacLayerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILayerFactory

    public class MacLayerFactory
extends DefaultLayerFactory
    A specialized layer factory implementation for MacOS X. This factory creates a subclass of TimeNowLayer which draws the vertical time now line different than the default one.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann

      • createSystemLayer

        public <T extends AbstractSystemLayer> T createSystemLayer(LayerContainer lc,
                                                           Class<T> layerType)
        Description copied from interface: ILayerFactory
        Creates a new system layer. The creation of all system layer types must be supported (all subclasses of AbstractSystemLayer).
        Specified by:
        createSystemLayer in interface ILayerFactory
        Overrides:
        createSystemLayer in class DefaultLayerFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the system layer
        Parameters:
        lc - the layer container, which will manage the layer
        layerType - the system layer class
        Returns:
        a system layer user interface component
